title: Some really bad and inconsistent lag this patch.
body: For the past games that I have been playing in this patch. i'm getting a consistent 300-2000 ping which is a stark contrast from my usual 55, any suggestions to fix it?

replies.body: Are you still experiencing an issue?  It sounds like you have a network issue that's causing this input delay.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of your specific issue.  The results should also provide a list of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if that doesn't help!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ep17kaAJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-19T20:21:33.832+0000)
>
> Are you still experiencing an issue?  It sounds like you have a network issue that's causing this input delay.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of your specific issue.  The results should also provide a list of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if that doesn't help!

Yeah I ranthe log reader and it doesn't seem to have any problem, want me to post results?

That's strange that there were no errors.  Just to be sure, please make sure that you are loading a match that you had these lag issues in.  If nothing comes up again, the next step would be to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) issues guide to strengthen your connection and make sure your settings keep you connected.  Let me know if you still have issues after going through each of those troubleshoot steps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ep17kaAJ,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-20T21:49:05.729+0000)
>
> That's strange that there were no errors.  Just to be sure, please make sure that you are loading a match that you had these lag issues in. Let me know if you still have issues after going through each of those troubleshoot steps

According to hextech I should be getting 41 to 55 ms. Weird.

Alright i'll try to rescan just to make sure.
same issue with me and no one wants to help
